alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 11 at 2:40PM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MONDAY TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 16 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM Monday to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. Travel could be very difficult or impossible. The hazardous conditions will impact the Monday evening and Tuesday commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
